name: Videocart-13: Robot War, Torpedo Alley
overview:
The hunter or the hunted. Take your pick in these action-packed 1 and 2 player games.

ROBOT WAR: The space station's computer has run amok. Four robots are on the hunt and you're the game! Lead them into one of the electrified force fields and short-circuit their calculated plans!

TORPEDO ALLEY: Play against time or compete with another gunner. Blast away with your shore battery and "deep six" the invading fleet!
